SEARCH

Deprecated API

Contents

  • Terminally Deprecated
  • Classes
  • Fields
  • Methods
  • Terminally Deprecated Elements
    Element
    Description
    org.rapidcontext.app.ApplicationContext.contextThreads()
    Thread introspection will be removed in a future release.
    org.rapidcontext.app.ApplicationContext.execute(String, Object[], String, StringBuilder)
    Use CallContext.execute() instead.
    org.rapidcontext.app.ApplicationContext.executeAsync(String, Object[], String)
    Background thread execution will be removed in a future release.
    org.rapidcontext.app.ApplicationContext.findContext(int)
    Thread introspection will be removed in a future release.
    org.rapidcontext.app.ApplicationContext.findContext(Thread)
    Thread introspection will be removed in a future release.
    org.rapidcontext.app.ApplicationContext.getBaseDir()
    Use inherited Context.baseDir() instead.
    org.rapidcontext.app.ApplicationContext.getEnvironment()
    Use inherited Context.environment() instead.
    org.rapidcontext.app.ApplicationContext.getInstance()
    Use active() instead.
    org.rapidcontext.app.ApplicationContext.getLibrary()
    Procedures and interceptors are now initialized as normal storage objects instead. The Library API will be removed.
    org.rapidcontext.app.ApplicationContext.getStorage()
    Use inherited Context.storage() or appStorage() instead.
    org.rapidcontext.app.proc.ThreadContextProcedure
    Thread introspection will be removed in a future release.
    org.rapidcontext.app.proc.ThreadCreateProcedure
    Background thread execution will be removed in a future release.
    org.rapidcontext.app.proc.ThreadInterruptProcedure
    Background thread execution will be removed in a future release.
    org.rapidcontext.app.proc.ThreadListProcedure
    Thread introspection will be removed in a future release.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.CallContext.ATTRIBUTE_END_TIME
    Call processing time is being removed.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.CallContext.ATTRIBUTE_ERROR
    Call result storage is being removed.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.CallContext.ATTRIBUTE_LOG_BUFFER
    Use ThreadContext.log() instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.CallContext.ATTRIBUTE_PROCEDURE
    Use CallContext.procedure() instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.CallContext.ATTRIBUTE_PROGRESS
    Progress tracking is being removed.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.CallContext.ATTRIBUTE_RESULT
    Call result storage is being removed.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.CallContext.ATTRIBUTE_SOURCE
    Use Context.id() for the ancestor request context.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.CallContext.ATTRIBUTE_START_TIME
    Use ThreadContext.created() instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.CallContext.ATTRIBUTE_TRACE
    Use CallContext.isLogging() instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.CallContext.ATTRIBUTE_USER
    Use ThreadContext.user() instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.CallContext.checkAccess(String, String)
    Use ThreadContext.requireAccess(String, String) instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.CallContext.checkInternalAccess(String)
    Use ThreadContext.requireAccess(String,String) with Role.PERM_INTERNAL instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.CallContext.checkReadAccess(String)
    Use ThreadContext.requireReadAccess(String) instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.CallContext.checkSearchAccess(String)
    Use ThreadContext.requireSearchAccess(String) instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.CallContext.checkWriteAccess(String)
    Use ThreadContext.requireWriteAccess(String) instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.CallContext.connectionReserve(String, String)
    Use #connectionReserve(String) instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.CallContext.exec(Object[])
    Use CallContext.execute(String, Object[]) instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.CallContext.getAttribute(String)
    Use Context.get(String, Class) instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.CallContext.getCallStack()
    Use methods directly on the CallContext instance.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.CallContext.getEnvironment()
    Use environment() instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.CallContext.getInterceptor()
    Handled by CallInterceptor or ReserveInterceptor instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.CallContext.getLibrary()
    Procedures and interceptors are now initialized as normal storage objects instead. The Library API will be removed.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.CallContext.getStorage()
    Use storage() instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.CallContext.isTracing()
    Use isLogging() instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.CallContext.logCall(String, Object[])
    Use ThreadContext#logRequest(String, Object[]) instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.CallContext.logCall(String, Bindings)
    Use ThreadContext#logRequest(String, Object[]) instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.CallContext.readPermission(int)
    Internal access is now achieved by combining read access with access via "procedure/**" (or a more limited pattern).
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.CallContext.setAttribute(String, Object)
    Use Context.set(String, Object) instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.CallContext.setInterceptor(Interceptor)
    Create a CallInterceptor or ReserveInterceptor instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.CallStack
    The CallContext class now encapsulates a call stack.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.CallStack.caller()
    Use CallContext.caller() instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.CallStack.contains(Procedure)
    Use CallContext.isCalledBy(Procedure) instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.CallStack.height()
    Use Context.depthOf(java.lang.Class<T>)(CallContext.class) instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.CallStack.toStackTrace(int)
    Use CallContext.stackTrace() instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.DefaultInterceptor
    Implemented in ReserveInterceptor or CallInterceptor instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.Interceptor
    Use ReserveInterceptor or CallInterceptor instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.Interceptor.call(CallContext, Procedure, Bindings)
    Inherit from CallInterceptor instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.Interceptor.releaseAll(CallContext, boolean)
    Inherit from ReserveInterceptor instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.Interceptor.reserve(CallContext, Procedure)
    Inherit from ReserveInterceptor instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.Library
    Procedures and interceptors are now initialized as normal storage objects instead. The Library API will be removed.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.Library.getInterceptor()
    Handled by CallInterceptor or ReserveInterceptor instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.Library.setInterceptor(Interceptor)
    Create a CallInterceptor or ReserveInterceptor instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.security.SecurityContext.auth(String)
    Use RequestContext.auth() instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.security.SecurityContext.authHash(String, String, String)
    Use RequestContext.authByMd5Hash() instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.security.SecurityContext.authToken(String)
    Use RequestContext.authByToken() instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.security.SecurityContext.currentUser()
    Use ThreadContext.user() instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.security.SecurityContext.deauth()
    Use RequestContext.close() instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.security.SecurityContext.hasAccess(String, String)
    Use ThreadContext.hasAccess(String,String) instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.security.SecurityContext.hasAccess(User, String, String)
    Use #hasAccess(User, String, String, String) instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.security.SecurityContext.hasInternalAccess(String)
    Use ThreadContext.hasAccess(String, String) instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.security.SecurityContext.hasReadAccess(String)
    Use ThreadContext.hasReadAccess(String) instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.security.SecurityContext.hasSearchAccess(String)
    Use ThreadContext.hasSearchAccess(String) instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.security.SecurityContext.hasWriteAccess(String)
    Use ThreadContext.hasWriteAccess(String) instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.security.Token.createAuthToken(String, long, String)
    Use createLoginToken(User, long) instead
    org.rapidcontext.core.security.Token.createAuthToken(User, long)
    Use createLoginToken(User, long) instead
    org.rapidcontext.core.security.Token.decodeAuthToken(String)
    Use validateLoginToken(String) instead
    org.rapidcontext.core.security.Token.validateAuthToken(User, String)
    Use validateLoginToken(String) instead
    org.rapidcontext.core.type.Role.PERM_INTERNAL
    Internal access is now achieved by combining Role.PERM_READ with Role.ACCESS_VIA "procedure/**" (or preferably a more restricted pattern).
    org.rapidcontext.core.type.Session.activeSession
    Use ThreadContext.active().session() instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.type.Session.authenticate()
    Session validation will be moved to RequestContext.
    org.rapidcontext.core.type.WebService.session(Request, boolean)
    Use ThreadContext.sessionRequired() instead.
  • Deprecated Classes
    Class
    Description
    org.rapidcontext.app.proc.ThreadContextProcedure
    Thread introspection will be removed in a future release.
    org.rapidcontext.app.proc.ThreadCreateProcedure
    Background thread execution will be removed in a future release.
    org.rapidcontext.app.proc.ThreadInterruptProcedure
    Background thread execution will be removed in a future release.
    org.rapidcontext.app.proc.ThreadListProcedure
    Thread introspection will be removed in a future release.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.CallStack
    The CallContext class now encapsulates a call stack.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.DefaultInterceptor
    Implemented in ReserveInterceptor or CallInterceptor instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.Interceptor
    Use ReserveInterceptor or CallInterceptor instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.Library
    Procedures and interceptors are now initialized as normal storage objects instead. The Library API will be removed.

    Field
    Description

    Call processing time is being removed.

    Use CallContext.procedure() instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.CallContext.ATTRIBUTE_PROGRESS
    Progress tracking is being removed.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.CallContext.ATTRIBUTE_RESULT
    Call result storage is being removed.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.CallContext.ATTRIBUTE_SOURCE
    Use Context.id() for the ancestor request context.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.CallContext.ATTRIBUTE_START_TIME
    Use ThreadContext.created() instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.CallContext.ATTRIBUTE_TRACE
    Use CallContext.isLogging() instead.

    Use ThreadContext.user() instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.type.Role.PERM_INTERNAL
    Internal access is now achieved by combining Role.PERM_READ with Role.ACCESS_VIA "procedure/**" (or preferably a more restricted pattern).
    org.rapidcontext.core.type.Session.activeSession
    Use ThreadContext.active().session() instead.
    org.rapidcontext.util.BinaryUtil.Hash.MD5
    Use SHA2 or SHA3 instead.
    org.rapidcontext.util.BinaryUtil.Hash.SHA1
    Use SHA2 or SHA3 instead.

    Method
    Description

    Thread introspection will be removed in a future release.

    Use validateLoginToken(String) instead
